name: Manikins
description:
When a writter runs out of ideas for their next horror book, what could sparkle inspiration ? Visiting an abandoned building ? It could be, depending on what lies inside ...

Made during 3 month by students of ETPA Montpellier, France.

During our second year of video games studies, we made our first project with Unreal Engine 5. 

- BORIE David

- COUTELLIER Romain

- DOUILLET Antoine

- FONTANNELI Grégoire

- HENG Alexis

- JEUNE Quentin

A game made by another group of the same school : 
https://falty.itch.io/two
